1. [imath] \quad\left(8 x^{4} y^{3} z\right) \div\left(-4 x^{2} y z\right) [/imath]\n2. [imath] \quad\left(-15 a^{6} b^{3} c^{2}\right) \div\left(-3 a^{2} b^{3} c\right) [/imath]\n3. [imath] \left(-\frac{2}{9} p^{10 m} q^{6 n}\right) \div\left(\frac{8}{3} p^{6 m} q^{n}\right) [/imath]
